company_context: Bitbucket | Git solution for teams using Jira Code and CI/CD, powered by AI and the Atlassian platform Accelerate software delivery from idea to code to production, with a seamless connection to Jira and AI beyond code creation Try it now Watch demo AI throughout the SDLC Reduce cycle times across the development lifecycle with AI-powered search, code review, pipeline triage, and even Jira updates. Extensible and all-in-one Streamline software development with a complete platform for issue tracking, source code, container registries, and CI/CD pipelines. Integrate your other tools as you need them. Platform-wide standards Be confident in your software delivery with enforced standards, policies, and compliance checks across all code and CI/CD. AI that provides context to code, not just vibes Friction slowing you down? Bitbucket helps you find your flow and stay there, with code and CI/CD connected to Jira and powered by AI Migrating to the cloud? Bitbucket Cloud supercharges code and CI/CD with AI that knows your team, code base, feature requirements, and more as part of the Atlassian Cloud platform, so no infrastructure is required. Get in touch 15 million developers build on Bitbucket 1/4 "The Jira/Bitbucket integration has transformed the way our software teams are able to communicate, work together, and deploy code. It's been an absolute game changer for us." Nate Van Dusen, Engineering Program Management Director Trulia 2/4 "With the integration, it’s possible to link each line of changed code back to a Jira work item, to understand not only what was changed, but why" Scott Carpenter, Global Cloud Architect Fugro 3/4 "Jira and Bitbucket are linked to show details and where the change is in production. It’s traceable, so they know what we’re doing and when we’re deploying." Kyle Gengler, Senior DevOps Engineer Nextiva 4/4 "We've gone from one big-bang release every month to 10-20 production deployments per day. We also reduced the average development cycle time from 5.8 days to 2.9 days and the standard deviation from 19.8 days to 3.5 days." Roman Bugaev, CTO Flo ← → Platform-wide AI beyond code generation Atlassian supercharges workflows with AI beyond code generation, accelerating development throughout the software lifecycle. Introducing Rovo Dev Reduce friction and automate busywork across software development with agentic AI for developers. Generate code plans, turn Jira items into code, review code and more. Learn about Rovo Dev AI where you work Spend more time coding with AI that knows your codebase in Bitbucket, work items in Jira, documentation in Confluence, and more, accessible anywhere, even in the CLI . Learn more AI-powered teams Contribute to any codebase on day one. With Rovo and Bitbucket, you and your team are always up to speed on all discussions, documentation, even work items statuses. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex, and I'm a Sales Development Representative with DeepData AI. I came across your company while researching innovative tech firms, and I noticed you're using Bitbucket and Jira to manage your software development lifecycle. Can you tell me a bit about your current workflow and any challenges you're facing in terms of data processing and integration?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Look, we're pretty set with our current tools. Bitbucket and Jira have been working well for us, especially with the AI-powered features that help us streamline our development process. What makes you think we need something else?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that you're satisfied with your current tools, but I'd like to explore how DeepData AI can complement your existing workflow. Our solution is designed to help teams like yours process and analyze large amounts of data more efficiently, which can lead to faster development cycles and improved collaboration. For example, we've worked with similar companies to reduce their data processing time by up to 50%. Can I ask, are you experiencing any bottlenecks in your data processing pipeline that might be slowing down your development cycles?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) I'm not sure I see how your solution would integrate with our existing tools. We've invested a lot in Bitbucket and Jira, and I'm not looking to add more complexity to our workflow. Plus, I'm not convinced that your solution would provide a significant enough ROI to justify the cost. What kind of integration do you offer, and how do you handle data security and compliance?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about integration and security. DeepData AI is designed to be highly flexible and can integrate seamlessly with a wide range of tools, including Bitbucket and Jira. We also take data security and compliance very seriously, with enterprise-grade encryption and compliance with major regulatory frameworks. In terms of ROI, we've seen our customers achieve significant reductions in data processing time and improvements in collaboration, which can lead to faster time-to-market and increased revenue. I'd be happy to provide some case studies and references from similar companies that have implemented our solution. Would you be open to a follow-up conversation to discuss further?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (somewhat intrigued) Okay, fine. I'll listen to what you have to say, but I'm still not convinced. Send me some information about your solution, and we can schedule a follow-up call to discuss further. But I have to warn you, we're a tough sell, and you'll need to demonstrate some compelling value to get our attention.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, I understand. I'll send over some information about DeepData AI, including some case studies and a brief overview of our solution. I'm looking forward to our follow-up conversation and exploring how we can help your team achieve even greater success with your software development workflow. Is there a specific time that works best for you for our next call, or would you like me to suggest a few options?
